main event: On 14 May 1952 in Malung Sawan, Sweden, four civilians in a car witnessed an object similar in size to an illuminated white aircraft passing from northeast to southwest. The object appeared to approach the earth somewhat, and no smoke or fire was observed.
interesting points: The object was thought to be meteoric by the Swedish Defense Staff.
The object was described as approaching the earth, but no explanation was given for this behavior.
No smoke or fire was observed, suggesting that it was not a typical aircraft.
The sighting was unexplained, and the Swedish Defense Staff considered it to be an unidentified flying object.
